name: Vwls: A Game About Vowels!
summary:
Vwls is a game all about Vowels. Did you get it?
Word finding has never been trickier and fun when all you have are scrambled consonants aided by a clue. Find the vowels, find the word.

name: V-Ware
summary:
V-Ware is a WarioWare-themed minigame with 21 microgames, unlockable achievements and online statistics!

Try to get as far as you can to make it to the highscore list, or practice individual microgames while trying to unlock something new!

name: VWisher
summary: Wish for a bunch of VTubers in VWisher, the non-profit VTuber Gacha Game. With 9 VTubers (as of release) and way more to come! Collect VTubers, Level them up then put them on exploration and fish enemyâ€™s to collect more VTubers.
